N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 542.4 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Facility means
any place in which services for the mentally ill are provided, including but
not limited to a psychiatric center, institute, clinic, ward, family care home, community residence, residential treatment facility, residential care center
for adults and hospital, except in the case of a hospital as defined in article
28 of the Public Health Law, it shall mean only a ward, wing, unit, or part
thereof which is operated for the purpose of providing services for the
mentally ill. (b) Law enforcement
agency means the State Police, the local police department or the sheriff's
department. Notes
